title: MD
biography: Nobel Prize. Associated with Sapienza University of Rome.
aiSummary: Rit Levi-Montalcini is a neurobiology specialist with an H-index of 26 at Sapienza University of Rome (Member). Has been published in Science (New York, N.Y.), Trends in neurosciences, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
